channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Roger's frozen food delivery truck gets stuck in a ditch in 'Pups Chill Out', then in 'Pups Save Farmer Alex', Farmer Yumi's animals are stampeding towards town.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: A silver ant is swept up by a sandstorm in 'The Search for the Silver Ant Hill', then in 'The Search for the Swamp Snapper', Sam and Kit visit the swamp to investigate a dinosaur sighting. (S1, ep 10).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: Indie helps the pals rehome a lost bee in 'The Hunt for the Hidden Hive', then in 'The Trouble of the Toppled Trees', Sam and Kit try to uncover who has been chewing the forest trees. (S1, ep 4).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: CatRat's Puzzle Hunt: The Gabby Cats have set up a puzzle hunt in the dollhouse! Gabby and Pandy solve riddles, look for clues and complete puzzle challenges. (S3, ep 2).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: King Thistle's New Clothes: Snooty King and Queen Marigold are coming to visit, but when the King's new clothes get dirty Nanny cleans them, along with the King's old clothes - and shrinks them all.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Elf School: Holly and Nanny Plum join Ben at Elf School, where the Wise Old Elf tells them that strictly no magic should be used. Holly finds it difficult until Nanny uses a little magic to help.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Doctor Hamster's Big Present; Little Cars: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Roman Day; Health Check: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Looking for Things; Woodland Club: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Recorders; Playing Golf: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Buddy the playful dragon from one of Alex's books gets out in 'Pups Save a Playful Dragon', and then in 'Pups Save the Critters', Francois's critters have gotten loose.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Wedding Day: It's the day of Mrs Cow and Mr Bull's wedding! Not everything goes to plan, but that doesn't stop it being the best wedding ever, and there is a lot of happy crying! (S7, ep 16).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Party Bus: Peppa receives an invite to Candy Cat's birthday party - on a double decker bus! (S7, ep 17).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Movie Night; Art House Day: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Magic Trick: Mummy Elephant invites Peppa and Daddy Pig to perform magic at Emily's birthday party, and Peppa shows her friends how the magic trick works. (S7, ep 22).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Wildflower Wood: Madame Gazelle and Mr Bull lead the children to the wildflower wood to learn all about flowers. The children enjoy identifying Wild Garlic, Bluebells and even an orchid! (S7, ep 20).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Jumping Stick; Racquet Games: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Caravan Friends; Chloe's Birthday Party: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Broken Party Bus: Miss Rabbit arrives with the broken bus. This is a job for Grampy Rabbit! Once fixed, Mummy Rabbit and Rebecca Rabbit arrive with a cake for Grampy Rabbit's birthday! (S7, ep 28).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Sunny Day Games: Peppa and George are playing at their grandparent's garden on a very hot day but they don't have a paddling pool! (S7, ep 21).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Lost City: Redbeard the Elf Pirate sets sail to find the lost city, but soon finds himself in trouble and in need of rescuing.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Queen Thistle's Teapot: Queen Thistle has a beautiful new teapot so delicate that no one is allowed to touch it. Holly accidentally breaks the teapot and tries to fix it with Ben's help.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Queen Thistle's Day Off: Queen Thistle decides to take a day off, so Holly, Ben, Nanny and the King have to look after the naughty twins Daisy and Poppy for the day.
